messages.title: STANDING WITH THERESA MAY
messages.content: CRAIG LAWTON Swansea West STANDING WITH THERESA MAY

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Craig will ensure that the £1.3 billion City Deal, signed by Theresa May, delivers more local investment and jobs.
Craig is committed to exploring options for marine and tidal projects so local residents benefit from greener and cheaper energy.
Craig will work with residents and businesses so local services get support and investment as we leave the EU.

issues.brexitEurope: Craig will work with residents and businesses so local services get support and investment as we leave the EU.
issues.economy: Craig will ensure that the £1.3 billion City Deal, signed by Theresa May, delivers more local investment and jobs.
issues.environment: Craig is committed to exploring options for marine and tidal projects so local residents benefit from greener and cheaper energy.

endorsements.endorsement: Back me on Thursday 8th June to lead Britain.
